Plot: A dedicated student at a medical college and his girlfriend become involved in bizarre experiments centering around the re-animation of dead tissue when an odd new student arrives on campus.
Title: Re-Animator
Actors: Jeffrey Combs, Bruce Abbott, Barbara Crampton, David Gale
Writer: H.P. Lovecraft (story "Herbert West,  Re-Animator"), Dennis Paoli (screenplay), William Norris (screenplay), Stuart Gordon (screenplay)
